actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

official_title: To direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish an eleventh region of the Environmental Protection Agency, comprised solely of the State of Alaska.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to establish: (1) an eleventh region of the EPA, comprised solely of the State of Alaska; and (2) a regional office for the region located in the State.Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish an eleventh region of the Environmental Protection Agency, comprised solely of the State of Alaska.
